Address: 500 11TH AVENUE NORTH SUITE 1000, NASHVILLE, Tennessee, 37203, United States of America
CompanyDescription: HealthStream, Inc. (HealthStream or the Company) provides workforce and provider solutions for healthcare organizations--all designed to support the people that deliver patient care, which in turn, supports the improvement of business and clinical outcomes. Delivered primarily as Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), our solutions focus on some of the most significant challenges facing the healthcare workforce and healthcare organizations today, including the need to effectively manage, retain, engage, and develop healthcare workforce talent; meet rigorous compliance requirements; and efficiently manage ongoing medical staff credentialing and privileging processes. With approximately 30 years of experience, HealthStream is recognized as a leading innovator and thought leader in the healthcare industry for its healthcare workforce solutions.  ... More ...
